name: Laser Cut Christmas Card Set - Present Group
description: Orders from outside the UK will no longer be shipped this year as the delivery date to receive items before Christmas has now passed. International orders will now re-commence shipping from Friday 3rd January. This pack of five Christmas cards feature a festive message alongside a group of beautifully wrapped presents. These lasercut cards are a fun way to say Merry Christmas! With each card having a metallic gold insert they also have a very luxurious feel, so you can be proud to send these Christmas cards to family, friends, neighbours and colleagues. Also, as they're lasercut, they are a lot more interesting and tactile than ordinary printed Christmas cards! The other lasercut cards in the last two images are available here. DETAILS ● The envelopes included are 100gsm ice white envelope and the cards are made from 150gsm ice white paper, with a 170gsm metallic gold inserts that are white on the reverse. ● The cards measure 14cm x 10cm and the envelopes measures 14.8cm x 10.5cm. DELIVERY ● Postage on all Mr Yen medium items (which includes sets of lasercut or printed cards, lasercut baubles, lasercut bunting and lasercut/papercut art) is £1.95 within the UK and £2.95 everywhere else. Your order will be sent out by First Class Royal Mail in the UK and First Class Royal Mail Airmail everywhere else. Your order will be sent out to you in a hard backed envelope to ensure it arrives with you safely. If you have a larger order, or you order a large quantity items, your item will be safely placed in a protective bubble padded envelope or a small cardboard box, surrounded by tissue paper and shredded packing paper.

name: Laser Cut Napkin Ring - Set of Four
description:
Orders from outside the UK will no longer be shipped this year as the delivery date to receive items before Christmas has now passed. International orders will now re-commence shipping from Friday 3rd January.

This set of four detailed laser cut napkin rings would finish your Christmas table perfectly, showing how much you pay attention to the small, but important details.

They're laser cut from jet black paper with a hand cut connecting section, which is really easy to put together.

If they are handled carefully, they can be used again and again, but remember they are made of paper and are fragile, so do be careful when handling them.

The festive design of these napkin rings is of entwining leaves and twigs that add a great decorative element to your table.

DETAILS
● The size of each napkin ring when flat is 17.5cm x 6.5cm

● Each napkin ring is individually lasercut from 150gsm black paper.

● Your napkin rings will be shipped flat, inside a cellophane bag backed with kraft card.

DELIVERY
● Postage on all Mr Yen small items (which includes single lasercut/printed cards and lasercut gift toppers/tags/napkin rings) is £0.95 within the UK and £1.95 everywhere else. Your order will be sent out by First Class Royal Mail in the UK and First Class Royal Mail Airmail everywhere else. Your order will be sent out to you in a hard backed envelope to ensure it arrives with you safely. If you have a larger order, or you order a large quantity items, your item will be safely placed in a protective bubble padded envelope or a small cardboard box, surrounded by tissue paper and shredded packing paper.

name: Laser Cut Quotes Set of Five
description:
Orders from outside the UK will no longer be shipped this year as the delivery date to receive items before Christmas has now passed. International orders will now re-commence shipping from Friday 3rd January.

This is a fantastic instant quote collection for that special someone who loves inspirational and meaningful quotes...or that person who has more frames than art and needs a gentle push to get them filled!

If you prefer, you could always give them as separate gifts to different people too as they are wrapped individually.

These lasercut quotes are ready to frame in an A4 frame (I suggest an IKEA Ribba frame) the design will fit with both a mount and without, but is not supplied with either. 

The quotes all come packaged in a postal kraft box, with them being individually wrapped in cellophane bags and backed with grey board.

DETAILS
● Size of each papercut and material: 
A4 (21cm x 29.7cm) 150gsm Jet Black paper, with a 180gsm metallic gold backing paper.

● Your papercuts will be delicately placed on to shredded gold paper, inside a kraft brown postal box and will be placed individually in sealed cellophane bags backed with hard grey board.

DELIVERY
● Postage on all Mr Yen medium items (which includes sets of lasercut or printed cards, lasercut baubles, lasercut bunting and lasercut/papercut art) is £1.95 within the UK and £2.95 everywhere else. name: Personalised Name Christmas Bauble
description:
Orders from outside the UK will no longer be shipped this year as the delivery date to receive items before Christmas has now passed. International orders will now re-commence shipping from Friday 3rd January.

This lasercut and etched bauble is a unique decoration for a very personalised Christmas.

Your little ones name is specially laser engraved on their very own personalised bauble in elegant typography onto plywood, giving a traditional feel for a very special keepsake. Imagine unpacking this bauble every year to decorate the family tree - what a great festive family tradition! 

There is a choice of three wreath designs which you can see in the images and your bauble will come complete with a white silk ribbon.....all you need to do to order your special Christmas bauble is first decide which wreath design you would like from the drop down menu. Next, just leave a note during checkout with the name and spelling EXACTLY as you would like to be engraved in the design.

DETAILS
● The size of your bauble is 7cm x 7cm and is lasercut and engraved on 3mm plywood.

● Your lasercut bauble will be placed in a small square black gift box, on a bed of gold shredded paper, then sealed with gold ribbon, before being placed in a bubble pack envelope to be posted out to you to ensure it arrives in perfect condition. If you order more than one bauble, they will be individually packed in their own gift boxes.

DELIVERY
● Postage on all Mr Yen medium items (which includes sets of lasercut or printed cards, lasercut baubles, lasercut bunting and lasercut/papercut art) is £1.95 within the UK and £2.95 everywhere else. Your order will be sent out by First Class Royal Mail in the UK and First Class Royal Mail Airmail everywhere else. Your order will be sent out to you in a hard backed envelope to ensure it arrives with you safely. If you have a larger order, or you order a large quantity items, your item will be safely placed in a protective bubble padded envelope or a small cardboard box, surrounded by tissue paper and shredded packing paper.

name: Personalised First Christmas Bauble
description:
Orders from outside the UK will no longer be shipped this year as the delivery date to receive items before Christmas has now passed. International orders will now re-commence shipping from Friday 3rd January.

This lasercut and etched bauble is a unique decoration for babies first Christmas. They grow so quickly, and they'll only ever have one first Christmas, so why not celebrate it with their very own first Christmas decoration. This could even be the start of your very own festive family tradition of getting a bauble every year!

Your little ones name will be specially laser engraved onto their bauble,  (made of plywood) in elegant typography, giving a very traditional feel for a very special keepsake. Imagine unpacking this bauble every year to decorate the family tree...you'll always remember their first Christmas.

There is a choice of three wreath designs which you can see in the images. Your child's name will be engraved above the words "First Christmas 2013" and will come complete with a white silk ribbon, knotted and ready to hang.

All you need to do to order your special Christmas bauble is first decide which wreath design you would like from the drop down menu, then, just leave a note during checkout with the name and spelling EXACTLY as you would like to be engraved in the design.

DETAILS
● The size of your bauble is 7cm x 7cm and is lasercut and engraved on 3mm plywood.

● Your lasercut bauble will be placed in a small square black gift box, on a bed of gold shredded paper, then sealed with gold ribbon, before being placed in a bubble pack envelope to be posted out to you to ensure it arrives in perfect condition. If you order more than one bauble, they will be individually packed in their own gift boxes.

name: Laser Cut Gingerbread Man Bunting
description:
Orders from outside the UK will no longer be shipped this year as the delivery date to receive items before Christmas has now passed. International orders will now re-commence shipping from Friday 3rd January.

This fun and friendly gingerbread man bunting makes a fantastic feature when decorating your house for the festive season!

Everyone loves to decorate their house at Christmas - and what better way to do it with sweet little gingerbread men! This festive bunting will add a fun element to your decorations this Christmas, and your little ones will love it too as it looks just like real gingerbread....remember not to eat it though!

The individual gingerbread are lasercut in a kraft brown colour card, which makes them look just like the real thing!

Oh and to make things a little easier for you, your lasercut gingerbread man bunting will be threaded and ready to hang!

DETAILS
● The individual gingerbread are made from 100% recycled 280gsm kraft coloured card and each individual gingerbread man measures 9cm x 11cm. They all come threaded onto 3mm white satin ribbon measuring 180cm long.

DELIVERY
● Postage on all Mr Yen medium items (which includes sets of lasercut or printed cards, lasercut baubles, lasercut bunting and lasercut/papercut art) is £1.95 within the UK and £2.95 everywhere else. name: Laser Cut Gingerbread Man Gift Topper
description:
Orders from outside the UK will no longer be shipped this year as the delivery date to receive items before Christmas has now passed. International orders will now re-commence shipping from Friday 3rd January.

This pack of twelve mini gingerbread men are a perfect way to finish off your gifts with a professional finish - what better way to pay attention to the small details!

Any gift given with these gift toppers will be very well received and you can even pose the little gingerbread mans arms and legs so they look like they're about to give you a hug!

As they are lasercut to be posable, you could always use them to decorate your house by just gently folding their arms and legs and propping them up against something.

You will receive your twelve lasercut gingerbread man gift toppers in a glassine envelope, which will then be placed in a hard backed envelope before being posted out to you.

DETAILS
● The individual gingerbread are made from either 130gsm kraft coloured paper, or 170gsm metallic gold paper. Each individual gingerbread man measures 7.5cm x 10cm.

Why not take some of the stress out of this years Christmas planning and stock up on these cards?! Imagine the smiles on all those festive faces when they open up the envelope and excitedly rush to proudly display your card, moving others out of the way to make room for yours!

name: Laser Cut Dia De Los Muertos Skull
description:
Orders from outside the UK will no longer be shipped this year as the delivery date to receive items before Christmas has now passed. International orders will now re-commence shipping from Friday 3rd January.

This lasercut skull was influenced by the sugar skull designs that feature in the mexican "Dia De Los Muertos" festival - or the Day of the Dead festival. This festival is held on November 1st and 2nd and it is a festival to honour and remember family relatives who have died.

DETAILS
● The skull measures 20cm x 14.5cm and is lasercut from 170 gsm metallic gold paper, or 150gsm jet black paper.

● Your papercut will be delicately wrapped in white tissue paper, tied with gold ribbon and sealed with gold tape.

name: Mr Yen Bow Wreath Christmas Card Set of Five
description:
Orders from outside the UK will no longer be shipped this year as the delivery date to receive items before Christmas has now passed. International orders will now re-commence shipping from Friday 3rd January.

This set of five cards (all one design) are great to send to all your friends, your family and even your neighbours! They have a bold contemporary papercut design, that has been styled and photographed by me and each papercut features the words "Merry Christmas" surrounded by a detailed festive wreath design.

Why not take some of the stress out of this years Christmas planning and stock up on these cards?! Imagine the smiles on all those festive faces when they open up the envelope and excitedly rush to proudly display your card, moving others out of the way to make room for yours!

name: Laser Cut Greeting Card - Botanical Circle
description:
Orders from outside the UK will no longer be shipped this year as the delivery date to receive items before Christmas has now passed. International orders will now re-commence shipping from Friday 3rd January.

This detailed lasercut card is based on one of my previous botanical hand cut designs. It features mini oak leaves, blackberry leaves, twigs, grasses, ferns and seed pods. It's a great size to frame after it has been sent, so you have a lovely delicate piece of art to frame, as well as a greeting card.

The metallic gold insert gives this card a special touch, and the card also comes with a luxurious jet black envelope.

DETAILS
● The size of the card is 210mm x 148mm and the material is a Jet Black 150gsm paper, with a 170gsm metallic gold insert.

● The envelope material is a 120gsm in a Jet Black colour which measures 210mm x 148mm (UK size A5)

description:
Orders from outside the UK will no longer be shipped this year as the delivery date to receive items before Christmas has now passed. International orders will now re-commence shipping from Friday 3rd January.

People always like to hear "Thank You" but they also secretly love to get something that shows how much you appreciate what they did!

name: If you're waiting for a sign...
description:
...this is it!

Orders from outside the UK will no longer be shipped this year as the delivery date to receive items before Christmas has now passed. International orders will now re-commence shipping from Friday 3rd January.

If you need that gentle push to move forward (or you know someone who does), this paper cut is a beautiful reminder that the only thing constant is change - so take the leap and follow the signs!

This hand cut paper cut circle of delicate leaves, seeds and flowers is organically arranged to create a delicate lace effect design, featuring the phrase "If you're waiting for a sign, this is it"

With every section of plant and flower being initially hand drawn and then cut out by hand, each paper cut design is completely original!

DETAILS
● Size of papercut and material: 
A4 (21cm x 29.7cm) 150 gsm Ice White paper.

● Your papercut will be delicately wrapped in white tissue paper, tied with gold ribbon and sealed with gold tape.

name: Completely Custom Design
description: Orders from outside the UK will no longer be shipped this year as the delivery date to receive items before Christmas has now passed. International orders will now re-commence shipping from Friday 3rd January. This listing is for a completely custom design and is for individual customers only. If you are a company or brand and would like me to create a specific design for your project, I would love to create something for you and the best way to hire me for freelance work is to contact me by email me here. If you would like to have your very own custom piece of art, I would love to work with you to create something fantastic! Every Mr Yen paper cut is cut by hand and is signed on the reverse. When you order a completely custom design you are buying a truly original piece of art to your specification! We can work together to create something spectacular with your ideas, creating a unique design for you - and only you. Once I have designed your piece, your design will not be available for anyone else to purchase except you. DETAILS ● Direct contact with me to create your design specifically for you - there is no middle man! ● An initial phone call/skype consultation (if desired) to discuss your ideas and concepts. If you prefer, this can be done through email communication. ● Regular email contact directly with me while designing your individual design. ● A digital proof of your design sent to you before any cutting takes place. ● Options! What do I mean by this? Well, if we create something that you feel isn't 'quite right' I will adjust it and work on it until it's perfect as I want you to be completely happy with your original piece of art! * One beautifully gift wrapped complete papercut, signed and posted out by Special delivery (or Airsure if outside the UK) with a hand written note sent to the recipient of your choice or direct to you! ● If you would like the digital file created of your paper cut design, this can be arranged and this will also slightly increase the price of this order, so it would be best to get in touch with me here so I can create you a specific customised listing in the Mr Yen shop. Your'e not just paying for the time and skill it takes to design and cut your custom paper cut, your buying a lifelong heirloom momento that is specially significant to you.
